snippet: Tight end Tony Gonzalez, who is contemplating retiring, has had an impressive career but has an 0-5 record in the playoffs.
abstract: Profile of Atlanta Falcons tight end Tony Gonzalez, who is busy preparing with team for upcoming playoff game against Seattle Seahawks; Gonzalez has had an impressive career, but is 0-5 in the playoffs.
lead_paragraph: Tight end Tony Gonzalez, who is contemplating retiring, has had an impressive career but has an 0-5 record in the playoffs.

headline.seo: N.F.C. — Falcons’ Tony Gonzalez Narrows Focus
headline.main: With Elusive Victory in Sight, Retirement Talk Must Wait
headline.print_headline: With Elusive Victory in Sight, Retirement Talk Must Wait
